alert.note: Alert for Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 4:14AM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range/East Lake County Above 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Significant blowing snow likely. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
